companyInfo.name: AADI ENTERPRISES
companyInfo.tagline: Premium & Essential Collections for Modern Hospitality

introduction.title: Enhancing Guest Comfort, One Detail at a time
introduction.description: Aadi Enterprises delivers a complete range of Housekeeping and In-Room Amenity Solutions designed for efficiency, elegance, and long-lasting performance — empowering hotels and resorts to craft unforgettable guest experiences.
imageDescriptions: Page 1: Two housekeeping staff members in uniform making a hotel bed.
Page 1: A stack of folded towels (white, beige, grey) next to green soap/lotion dispensers on a marble surface.
Page 2: Polaroid-style photos showing cleaning supplies in a bucket and a collection of hotel bathroom amenities (soaps, brushes, etc.).
Page 2: A full view of a modern, well-appointed hotel room with a neatly made bed and city view.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Where Function Meets Luxury
points: Tailored solutions for all property categories – from budget to luxury.
Focus on durability, hygiene, and design aesthetics.
Supported by after-sales service and expert consultation.
imageDescriptions: An image of a luxury resort with palm trees and a tiled roof.
A large hotel building with a curved facade next to a swimming pool.

productSegmentsOverview.title: Product Segments Overview
productSegmentsOverview.subtitle: TWO CURATED RANGES TO SUIT EVERY NEED
imageDescriptions: A guest couple checking in at a hotel reception desk.
Breakfast tray being served on a neatly made hotel bed.
A female housekeeper carrying a basket of cleaning supplies.

premiumRange.title: Premium Range
items: Egyptian cotton bedsheets, duvets & pillow covers

imageDescriptions: A stack of white towels with AADI branded amenities on a bathroom counter.
A hotel room interior with a bed and a desk with a water bottle.
Two white candles in glass jars.

productCategories.headline: First Impressions That Last
productCategories.description: functional, Safe, and Stylish Solutions for Every Hotel Entry Point. From the grand hotel lobby to the service entrance, Aadi Enterprises provides durable, aesthetic, and functional entrance solutions designed to enhance safety, cleanliness, and brand appeal.

subCategories.subCategory: Front of the House Solutions (Lobby Area)

premiumRange.title: Premium (Luxury/5★)
items: Designer floor mats with logo engraving

subCategories.description: Durable Utility Solutions for High-Traffic Areas

imageDescriptions: Hotel closet with wooden hangers and a digital safe.
A tray on a hotel room table with a kettle, mugs, and amenities.
A white laundry bag and slippers on a hotel room floor.
A modern hotel bathroom with an illuminated mirror and marble sink.
An illustration of a bathroom scene with a bathtub and shower curtain.

premiumRange.title: Premium Range
items: Faux leather notepad holders, tissue boxes, and remote holders

imageDescriptions: A black digital safe with the AADI logo inside a wooden cabinet.
A leatherette tissue box with the AADI logo on a table.
A breakfast tray with juice and croissants on a bed.

productCategories.headline: Smart Solutions for a Spotless Property
productCategories.description: From janitorial carts to electronic cleaning machines, our housekeeping products blend efficiency, safety, and design — empowering staff to maintain immaculate standards with minimal effort.

premiumRange.title: Premium Range
items: Designer dustbins, ash urns & smoking stations

brands.name: IPC (by Tennant Company)
brands.description: IPC (Integrated Professional Cleaning), a leading manufacturer of cleaning machines and equipment, is a part of the Tennant Company, USA

brands.name: Kärcher
brands.description: Kärcher is a family-owned global leader in cleaning technology. Discover the range of quality pressure washers, steam cleaners, window vacs & more

brands.name: Trust
brands.description: Trust Housekeeping services would likely focus on their expertise in providing professional and reliable cleaning solutions for businesses and commercial spaces

brands.name: Euronics
brands.description: Euronics, founded in 2002, aims to provide innovative products and services in public washroom automation for the growing Indian IT and hospitality sectors. It is now the largest brand in this market in India.

brands.name: Dolphy
brands.description: Dolphy India Pvt. Ltd is India's leading single brand manufacturer and supplier of hygienic products. We make high quality durable product for customer's having best performance.

brands.name: Vileda
brands.description: Vileda is a German-based company that specializes in the manufacture and sale of household and professional cleaning products.

brands.name: JVD
brands.description: JVD is a French company founded in 1984 that designs and manufactures hygiene and hotel equipment. It offers a variety of products for guest rooms and public areas, including hairdryers, kettles, minibars, and soap dispensers.

brands.name: Origami
brands.description: Origami is a prominent Indian manufacturer of disposable paper products, specializing in tissues and hygiene products.

brands.name: Saraya Mystair
brands.description: Saraya Mystair Hygiene Private Limited, founded in 2010, is a top manufacturer and supplier in India of tissue paper items, dispensers, hand dryers, liquid soap, and more.

reasons.description: supplier for all housekeeping and guest amenity needs
